title: Instructions: How to add Crypto Emergency to your MetaMask wallet
paragraph1: We will tell you how to add Crypto Emergency to MetaMask for use CEM coin.
paragraph2: To add a CEM network, you need to unlock the MetaMask wallet and click on the account logo in the upper right corner.

content.text: Select the 'Settings' item from the menu
Below we look for the 'Networks' section and click on it.
Now you see a list of all added networks, click on the 'Add network' button.
In the Add New Network form, fill in everything by pattern.

content.p6: You can specify any network name. (Crypto Emergency)
content.p7: After filling in all the fields, click 'Save.'

content.text: Congratulations, you added Crypto Emergency to your MetaMask and can now store CEM coins
